=== FTP Connection ===

In order to connect to ftp server via Windows Explorer:

  * Open internet explorer, go to Tools->Internet Options
  * In the advanced tab, be sure that "Enable FTP folder view(Outside of Internet Explorer" is checked and "Use Passive Mode FTP" is UNCHECKED
  * Open windows explorer and go to "ftp://129.16.213.108/groups/apollo/"
  * Use our username and password when asked

All of the web site files reside in /apollo_webroot/ folder and SQL backups will saved in sqlbackup folder.
